Overrides:
toString in class Object
isTrade 
 public static boolean isTrade(String confirmation)
Return true if argument is a trade confirmation.

record 
 static void record(String confirmation,
                    Accounts traderAccounts)
Record the trade, if any, to disk. Argument is a confirmation, which is not necessarily a trade. We identify trades by looking for substrings "bought" and "from". Also, update the traderAccounts in memory.
